original_text: Sing a new song to the Lord! All over the earth, people should praise him. Praise him, you people who travel over the sea and everything that lives in the sea. Praise him, you people who live in lands far away. Sing a new song to the Lord! All over the earth, people should praise him. Praise him, you people who travel over the sea and everything that lives in the sea. Praise him, you people who live in lands far away. Sing a new song to the Lord!
korean_text: 항해하는 자들과 바다 가운데의 만물과 섬들과 거기에 사는 사람들아 여호와께 새 노래로 노래하며 땅 끝에서부터 찬송하라

sentences.original_text: Sing a new song to the Lord!
you people who travel over the sea
and everything that lives in the sea.
you people who live in lands far away.
Sing a new song to the Lord!
